messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: apology
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Chris I m sorry.  I didn t mean my comment as a complaint. I thought the typo was a bit of amusing scatological humor. I apologibe.....oops....apologize
messages.messageBody:
Hi Chris
I'm sorry. I didn't mean my comment as a complaint. I
thought the typo was a bit of amusing scatological
humor.

I apologibe.....oops....apologize

Sharon who cames...oops....makes scads of typos all of
the time

Lynda

messages.subject: Re: We're Now Big Time Commercial
messages.msgSnippet: ... Lynda, I had exactly the same response when I saw this at the book store last week. I think the Dunny s guide is out to.. or due to be out. Gosh, I don t
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Lynda" <lurine@s...> wrote:
> It is official!! Homeschooling has now made the big time!!! Front
> and center in its shiney new dust jacket was "An Idiots Guide to
> Homeschooling."

Lynda,

I had exactly the same response when I saw this at the book store
last week. I think the Dunny's guide is out to.. or due to be out.
Gosh, I don't know that I want to be mainstream......

Thinking out loud,

Chris O'Connor

messages.subject: We're Now Big Time Commercial
messages.msgSnippet: Well, homeschooling is now officially big business!  Our library has a shelf of all the new books they buy and it is right next to the check out area. Well,
messages.messageBody:
Well, homeschooling is now officially big business! Our library has a shelf
of all the new books they buy and it is right next to the check out area.
Well, took the kidlets to the library today to get our weekly truckload of
books. As we're standing there waiting to check out, I always take a gander
at the newest arrivals.

It is official!! Homeschooling has now made the big time!!! Front and
center in its shiney new dust jacket was "An Idiots Guide to Homeschooling."

Whatever will be next <g>

Lynda
